text:
Above pt with a very complicated PMH.  Hepatitis B with autoimmune
   cholangiopathy, ESRD, Diabetes, HTN, CVA with left sided weakness most
   notable in Leg.  Recent long complicated hospitalization [**Date range (1) 11787**] for
   complications of PEG placement on [**1-16**] with abdominal wall abscess s/p
   ex lap, closure of gastrostomy and peg removal, I&D abd wall abscess
   X3/necrotizing fasciitis with wound vac.  Pt was at rehab after
   complicated hospital coarse and started treatment for positive CDIFF on
   3/31pt was subsequently sent back to [**Hospital1 1**] on [**4-6**] for increased WBC
   with hypotension and lethargy.  Pt was admitted on [**4-6**] to MICU was
   volume resuscitated with good effect on SBP.  Pt also had a
   paracentesis done without evidence of SBP.  Leni
s done which showed no
   clot but upper extremity US showing old RIJ clot, L brachial clot and
   RUQ ultrasound showing new portal vein clot.  Pt stabilized and then
   trnf to floor on [**4-8**].  On floor pt with persistent fevers and profuse
   diarrhea.  ABX restarted on [**4-11**] [**2-2**] to fever 103.  Also while on floor
   ? possible febrile sz [**2-2**] episode of increased confusion and arm
   flapping  but not confirmed .  CT scan negative.  Pt HD dependant last
   dialysis on [**4-12**] 3 liters removed.  On floor [**4-14**] pt given 2mg dilaudid
   at 5am for pain.  At 8am during rounds pt was alert and oriented with
   stable vitals.  During ID rounds pt found unresponsive wth RR of 4
   hypotensive but with a pulse.  Pt was intubated given 1 liter of fluid
   and TNF to SICU under MICU service.
   Hypotension (not Shock)
   Assessment:
          Pt arrived to SICU this am with SBP mid 80
s intubated on no
   sedation
          On arrival pt was following commands and attempting to mouth
   words
          Pt SBP maintaining >90 shortly after arrival
          Pt started on low dose prop for comfort
          Pt also with known Upper extremity clots for which she had
   been on heparin gtt but gtt currently on hold for  paracentesis today
   Action:
          Head CT done to r/o bleed or stroke
          Pt SBP becoming increasingly labile Levo started
          Aline placed
          Pt requiring increased sedation
          CPAP [**5-11**] attempted
          BC sent X2
   Response:
          Goal MAP > 60
          Levo titrated on/off to maintain MAP
          Pt becoming increasingly tachypnic on CPAP back on CMV
          Currently on 20mcgs/kg of prop
          Levo off as MAP >60
          Head CT neg for bleed heparin gtt still off for line
   placements
   Plan:
          Central line to be placed by MICU
          CT scan torso with contrast
          Cont to attempt vent wean
          Cont to monitor for sepsis
          F/U BC
          Pt lives at home with mom and 2 children. Mother is Creole
   speaking only.  Updated today via [**Name6 (MD) 11936**] and MD.
          Cont with current plan of care
